thread.title: High school football: State tournament pairings
thread.title_full: High school football: State tournament pairings | Deseret News

author: James Edward
title: High school football: State tournament pairings
text:
Here's a rundown of the high school football state tournament pairings for 5A, 4A, 3AA, 3A, 2A and 1A.
More Coverage High School football: Alta blows by Corner Canyon 45-31 High school football: Bobcats win battle of Cache Valley unbeatens in defensive slugfest, 5-0 High school football state tournament pairings 
Class 5A 
Friday’s first round 
Upper bracket 
Pleasant Grove (6-4) at Jordan (8-2)
Syracuse (4-5) at Sky View (10-0)
Fremont (5-4) at Davis (9-0)
Brighton (7-3) at Herriman (7-3)
Lower bracket 
Roy (5-3) at Hunter (6-4)
West Jordan (5-4) at Lone Peak (10-0)
American Fork (5-5) at Bingham (9-1)
Viewmont (5-5) at Mountain Crest (8-1)
Class 4A 
Friday’s first round 
Upper bracket 
Murray (6-4) at Provo (8-2)
Region 5 No. 4 at Springville (9-0)
Spanish Fork (5-5) at East (7-2)
Alta (7-3) at Kearns (8-2)
Lower bracket 
Region 8 No. 3 at Highland (6-3)
Corner Canyon (3-6) at Olympus (7-3)
Region 6 No. 4 at Timpview (8-1)
Bountiful (6-4) at Wasatch (8-2)
Note : In Region 5, Bonneville, Woods Cross and Box Elder tied for the last playoff spot, A three-way play-in game will be played at Box Elder on Tuesday at 4 p.m. Bonneville and Box Elder play in the first half, and the winner plays Woods Cross in the second half.
In Region 6, Skyline, Cyprus and Hillcrest all tied for the last playoff spot, and a three-way play-in game will be necessary next Tuesday at Taylorsville at 4 p.m. Cyprus and Skyline will play in the first half, and Hillcrest will play the winner in the second half.
In Region 8, Maple Mountain, Spanish Fork and Salem Hills tied for the last two playoff spots. By virtue of the region tiebreakers, Spanish Fork gets the No. 4 seed, and then Maple Mountain and Salem Hills will play for the No. 3 seed on Tuesday at Salem Hills at 4 p.m.
Class 3AA 
Friday’s first round 
Judge (3-7) at Cedar (4-5)
Snow Canyon (4-5) at Stansbury (7-3)
Pine View (5-4) at Bear River (3-7)
Park City (5-5) at Hurricane (5-3)
Note : Logan, Tooele, Dixie, Desert Hills have byes into the quarterfinals. In 3AA North, Park City, Bear River and Judge all tied for fourth, and a coin flip will be necessary to determine the No. 4, 5 and 6 seeds.
Class 3A 
Friday’s quarterfinals 
Upper bracket 
South No. 4 at Juan Diego (9-1)
Union (5-5) at Juab (8-2)
Emery (4-5) at North Sanpete (6-4)
Manti (5-4) at Morgan (8-2)
Note : Canyon View and Delta tied for the last playoff spot from 3A South, and they’ll have a play-in on Tuesday at 4 p.m. at Richfield High School
Class 2A 
Friday’s quarterfinals 
Upper bracket 
Enterprise (5-5) at South Summit (9-0)
Summit Academy (6-4) at San Juan (6-3)
Millard (5-5) at Beaver (8-1)
Grand (6-4) at North Summit (6-3)
Class 1A 
Friday’s quarterfinals 
Upper bracket 
Milford (5-4) at Duchesne (7-2), 3 p.m.
Altamont (4-6) at Kanab (7-3)
Layton Christian (2-8) at Diamond Ranch (8-0)
Monticello (5-5) at Rich (4-5)
